Class Pet

  • java.lang.Object
    • ue5.Animal
      • ue5.Pet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMovable, ISlaughterable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chicken, Cow

    public abstract class Pet
extends Animal
implements ISlaughterable
    The class pet provides attributes for its subclasses It inherits from Animal
    Author:
    Michael Kinzkofer, Paul Jureschek

      • Pet

        public Pet(Color color,
           int age,
           java.lang.String name,
           Villager owner)
        Constructor for Pets. Checks if owner is farmer, but after calling super-constructor. If owner is not farmer, it will break.
        Parameters:
        color - color of pet
        age - age of pet
        name - name of pet
        owner - owner of pet
